resources.string: "Check out this beautiful app to customize your Power Menu of your rooted android device!"
"Simply restarts the Android UI by killing the zygote process"
"Are you sure you want to delete [PRESETNAME]?\nThis can't be undone!"
"Would you like to import this preset?"
"Use Graphics instead of the Letter circles."
"Show the Power Menu on the lockscreen, when disabled nothing will show."
"Cannot start new recording as previous recording is still being processed"
"Unable to save recording to output file"
"Not all permissions are granted, some functions may not work..."
"Required for future functions (little tip: custom images)."
"Required for the screen recorder to record the screen."
"Required to record audio with the screen recorder."
"Required to display the Power Menu on top of everything."
"Required to prevent killing of the torch and screenrecord service."
"This Preset will be uploaded to the public server, visible to all other users.\n\nThis is your last chance to adjust the name or the creator before uploading..."
"This name is already in use, please choose another one."
"This creator name is protected, choose another one or log in."
"Can't connect to the server!\nPlease check your network connection or try again later."
"Can't connect to the database!\nPlease try again later, when nothing changes: Please report it to the developer."
"Required to download/upload presets from/to the public server."

"The user names of registered users are protected so no one can upload in their name, here you can log in or create an new account.\nThis is not required if you don't want to!\nI will never share any private data!"
"You can set your password via the link in the activation E-mail (the E-mail is only available in English)."
"Need an account?\nClick here to create a new account!"
"Sorry, the chosen name or email address is already in use."
"Registration successful, you will receive an email to activate your account!"

"Presets uploaded: [UPLOADCOUNT]

Stars given: [STARSGIVEN]
Stars received: [STARSRECEIVED]

Your presets (ordered by stars):
[TOP5PRESETS]"
"Something went wrong, please check your input."
"The colors of the dialog when clicked on [BUTTON]."
"The color of the reveal animation when clicked on a Reboot/Shutdown option."
"Can't access your account?\nClick here for recovering options."
"You will receive a email with instructions on how to reset your password."
"Save with current graphics.|This preset contains graphics, do you want to load them?\nThis will overwrite your current graphics!"

"Are you sure to report [PRESETNAME]?
This can't be undone, so please don't report just for fun!

Also we need a reason why you want to report it, please enter it below.|Report reason:"
"[PRESETNAME] reported, the developer will have a look at it.|Report failed, please try again.\nReason: "
"Waiting for other downloads...|Connecting to server...|Requesting information... |Downloading...|Cancelling..."
"Waiting for other uploads...|Connecting to server...|Requesting information... |Uploading...|Cancelling..."

"Add normal item
Just a normal item with only one slot.|Add multi item
Add up to three items in one line.|Add multi page item
Clicking it will show a new 'page'."
"Multi page item starts here\nThe first normal item defines the button to open the 'new page'.|Multi page item ends here"
"Root and Xposed not available|Root and Xposed are required for this module to work."
"Xposed working, Root not|But Root is needed to Power off or Reboot...\nPlease allow root access."
"Root working, Xposed not|But Xposed is needed to replace the Power Menu...\nPlease activate the module in the Xposed installer."
"Root and Xposed are working|The app should work fine!"
"Hooked Module version is to low...|Please restart your device to complete the update process!"
"Graphics|Change the graphics, use custom or predefined graphics."
"Visibility and Order|Select the items you want to show and order them as you wish."
"Animations|Change the animations or disable them completely."
"Account|Here you can login, create an account or check your statistics when logged in."
"Advanced Settings|Change advanced settings such as delays, gravity or speed."
"Permissions|Show the requested permissions and see for what they are being used for.\nGrant additional permissions that are not added on first start (Android 6.0+)."
"Hide app in launcher|Hides the app icon in the launcher, it can take up to a reboot to hide the icon.\nThis settings screen will only be accessible via the Xposed Installer then."
"Deep Xposed logging|Enable advanced Xposed logging, after enabling reboot to see changes."
"Source|NeoPowerMenu is open source.\nCheck out the source on GitHub."
"Share|Like the app? Share it with your friends."
"Code by Neon-Soft / DrAcHe981|based on the source of Naman Dwivedi (naman14).\nClick here to get more info."
"Fade|Reveal\n(Works only for the background)|Slide up|Slide left|Slide right|Slide down|Scale up|Scale down|Disabled"
"Loading...|Please wait...|Show more presets|Click here to show more presets.|The End.|No more presets to show.|Click here to try again."
"Are you sure you want to reboot your device?|Are your sure you want to power off your device?"
"Require confirmation|Enable a confirmation dialog before reboot or power off."
"Donate|Like the app?\nWhy not donate me a cup of coffee or something else?"
"Hide the menu when clicking on an toggle button."
"Load App icons for app shortcut buttons."
Hook into the PhoneWindowManager instead of the GlobalActions class.\nUse careful, don\'t enable if the normal hook works for your device!\nReboot to see changes.
"By default custom icons wont get colored, activating this will change that."
"Make app icons round, if they don't match in the circles."
"Click here to let the tour begin."
"First off all: Thank you for downloading my app!\n\nThis little tour will show you the basics to use my app."
"Here you can find all the different sections and also see if the app works correctly, everything is well ordered ^^."
"Here starts your customization: you can change every color!\nOffering the most customizable power menu is my main goal."
"Customize the graphics that are used (needs to be enabled in the advanced settings)."

"Choose what you want to have in your menu and sort the options as you wish.
Click on the '+' to add new items, swipe the item out of the screen to delete it.

The 'lock' icon means: show on the lockscreen.
The 'i' icon means: show item description."
"Change the way the menu animates in and out or disable the animations completely."
"Here you can mainly customize the entire power menu behavior."
"That's the end of my little tour, but don't worry, there are much more features!\nJust try it yourself and find your perfect power menu."
"Use su commands to shutdown or reboot. If deactivated it will try to run commands on the system process, this may fail on some devices."
"Defines the graphic padding.\nHigher value = Smaller graphics. (Default 0dp)"
"The downloaded file is not complete.\nPlease try it again."
"Failed to connect to the server, please check your connection and try it again."
"Failed to request the needed information, please check your connection and try it again."
"Failed to download the file, please check your connection and try it again."
"There was an unknown problem while downloading the file, please try it again."
"Failed to connect to the server, please check your connection and try it again."
"Failed to request the needed information, please check your connection and try it again."
"Failed to upload the file, please check your connection and try it again."
"There was an unknown problem while uploading the file, please try it again."
"First Item text: (make empty to use default)"
"Second Item text: (make empty to use default)"
"Third Item text: (make empty to use default)"
"Invalid move operation, There can't be a start after the end or an end before the start!"
"Backup all your settings and restore them later, also you could delete settings if something goes wrong or if you just want a fresh menu."
"Click here to save all settings to the local storage root."
"Click here to get a dialog with settings you could reset, Use this if something somehow destroyed some settings and the app keeps crashing when entering the corresponding screen."
"Please choose what you want to backup:\nSelecting 'Presets' or 'Graphics' could lead to a big backup file!"
"Backup name: (Leave empty to use an automated name)"
"Please choose what you want to restore:"
"Please choose what you want to delete:"
"File restore almost complete!\nClick on restart to complete the file restore process. (This could take some time)"
"File deleting almost complete!\nClick on restart to complete the file deleting process. (This could take some time)"
"File deleting failed...\nPlease try it again, some files may be corrupted now..."
"File restore failed...\nPlease try it again, some files may be corrupted now..."
"Restore failed, unknown file type!\nPlease try it again."
"Main preferences (Unique device id, advanced settings etc.)"

"It seems like you have uninstalled my module before you disabled it...\nNow the system don't knows what to do here, please click on restart to restart your device and to complete the uninstallation!"
